name: Cantidad Actual por Tipo
query:
select  sum(b.actual_qty) as 'Cantidad Actual:Float:', a.item_group as 'Tipo' 
from `tabItem` a inner join
 `tabBin` b on a.item_code = b.item_code left join
 `tabCFDI Clave Producto` c on a.clave_producto = c.name

group by a.item_group
order by sum(b.actual_qty) desc
